name: 霓幻云端 NeonHClouds
description: In the world of 'NeonHClouds', the player is a spaceship pilot patrolling outside the Earth, shooting enemies and destroying enemy planes to defend the Earth. Players can control the spaceship to defeat enemy planes by shooting, or temporarily strengthen themselves by picking crystals to obtain better scores and attack effects. By controlling the amount and accuracy of bullets fired, players can achieve higher scores! The game contains six crystals with different effects, each with unique functions and appearances, making players' shooting experience more rich and interesting. By picking up frequently occurring crystals, players can gain a faster and more exciting gaming experience!
